meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: SPECIAL RECOGNITION
agenda_items.description: Special recognition of former Park Board Member Priscilla Rice for her service to the Park & Recreation Board

agenda_items.title: Kidd Springs Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Alison Matis, to serve alcohol at the Blues, Bandits & BBQ event to be held at Kidd Springs Park.

agenda_items.title: Bachman Lake
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Taryn Federer, to serve alcohol at the Super Sam's 5k & Dino Dash event to be held at Bachman Lake.

agenda_items.title: Interlocal Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a 20-year interlocal agreement between the City of Dallas and the Richardson Independent School District for shared access of campus grounds.

agenda_items.title: Preston Green Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize adoption of the Preston Green Park Master Plan.

agenda_items.title: Bachman Creek Greenbelt
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on December 11, 2024, regarding the proposed use of a portion of parkland.

agenda_items.title: Encroachment Policy
agenda_items.description: Authorize approval of the revisions to the Park and Recreation Department Encroachment Policy.

agenda_items.title: Briefing
agenda_items.description: Fair Park First Independent Accountâ€™s Report & Related Fair Park First Contracts

agenda_items.title: Executive Session
agenda_items.description: Seeking advice of the City Attorney regarding various matters.

agenda_items.title: OTHER/NON-ACTION ITEMS
agenda_items.description: Staff Announcements and Park & Recreation Board Members liaison reports.
